Privacy Policy

Home > Privacy Policy

Datrix Insights is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy outlines how we collect, use, share, and safeguard your personal information when you interact with our website (www.datrixinsights.com), services, or platforms.

  1. Information We Collect

We may collect the following types of data:

Personal Information: Name, email, job title, company, and contact details (provided voluntarily via forms, subscriptions, or inquiries).

Technical Data: IP address, browser type, device information, cookies, and usage patterns (collected automatically through analytics tools).

Third-Party Data: Information from partners or publicly available sources (e.g., LinkedIn for business purposes).

  1. How We Use Your Information

Your data is used to:

Deliver and improve our services (e.g., AI-driven analytics tools, research reports).

Respond to inquiries, provide customer support, and send service updates.

Analyze trends and user behavior to enhance platform performance.

Send marketing communications (with your consent).

Comply with legal obligations.

  1. Legal Basis for Processing

We process data based on:

Consent: For marketing or optional services.

Contractual Necessity: To fulfill service agreements.

Legitimate Interests: Improving our services and preventing fraud.

  1. Data Sharing

We may share your information with:

Service Providers: Third-party vendors for hosting, analytics, or payment processing.

Business Partners: Collaborators in joint research or projects (with transparency).

Legal Authorities: When required by law or to protect our rights.

We never sell your personal data.

  1. International Data Transfers

Data may be transferred globally, including outside the EU/EEA. We ensure safeguards (e.g., Standard Contractual Clauses) for cross-border transfers.

  1. Your Rights

Under GDPR, CCPA, and other laws, you may:

Access, correct, or delete your data.

Opt out of marketing communications.

Restrict processing or request data portability.

Withdraw consent (where applicable).

To exercise these rights, contact us at info@datrixinsights.com.

  1. Data Security

We implement technical and organizational measures (e.g., encryption, access controls) to protect your data from unauthorized access or breaches.

  1. Data Retention

We retain personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes outlined, unless a longer retention period is required by law.

  1. Cookies and Tracking Technologies

We use cookies to enhance user experience. You can manage preferences via your browser settings.

  1. Policy Updates

We may update this policy periodically. Changes will be posted on this page with a revised effective date.

Contact Us

For questions or requests regarding this policy:

Email: Info@datrixinsights.com

Address: 98/225, South west Delhi, 110046
